page.title: 12Horse Riding, Mow Cop
page.content: This area is proving to be very popular with people who like horses. There are a number of horses kept in fields around Mow Cop and in terms of field occupied by horses they equal fields of cows or other animals. A lot are kept singly or in pairs in a small field adjacent to a house, the spread nature of the buildings on Mow Cop help this. There is a riding school called Siddall's at Machins Farm, near the disused quarries on the road leading to Gillow Heath. Here small parties are taken out on escorted rides, riders are taught how to jump and how to ride.
